query:
ALTER TABLE dojo_settings 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS city VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS state VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS zipCode VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS country VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'United States',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS weatherApiKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableWeatherAlerts INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasOutdoorClasses INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS heatIndexThreshold INT DEFAULT 95,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS airQualityThreshold INT DEFAULT 150,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentProvider VARCHAR(50);

ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS city VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS state VARCHAR(100),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS zipCode VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS country VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT 'United States',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS weatherApiKey VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS enableWeatherAlerts INT DEFAULT 1,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS hasOutdoorClasses INT DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS heatIndexThreshold INT DEFAULT 95,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS airQualityThreshold INT DEFAULT 150,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS paymentProvider VARCHAR(50);
